alert.note: Alert for Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sumter, eastern Pasco and northwestern Polk Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 754 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dade City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zephyrhills, Dade City, St. Leo, Zephyrhills West, Zephyrhills North, Zephyrhills South, Polk City, Rockridge, Zephyrhills Municipal Airport, Withla, Richland, Lacoochee, Dade City North, Crystal Springs, and The Green Swamp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
